text: *Creaaaaaak... slam!*

name: Me
text: Haa, haa... sheesh...
Beyond the doorway, we found ourselves in a luxurious space that seemed to be an entrance foyer of sorts.
It had exactly the type of atmosphere one would expect from a noble's castle.
Each furnishing looked expensive, and it felt like we had entered a medieval castle that had been renovated into a hotel.

name: Me
text: Looks like we managed to lose those strange scarecrows...
We closed the thick door and pulled down the very medieval-looking drawbar to lock it.
The group of scarecrows outside had been noisy for a moment, but they were now quiet.

name: Hebiko
text: But they'll attack again if heberybody goes out there.

name: Me
text: Yeah, then we should just keep moving forward. I want to know who's manipulating those scarecrows.
There was also the issue of Yukikaze and Clear. I couldn't imagine there were many people who were able to win against them...
If by some chance they had been captured by some weird guy, I couldn't just leave them.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Uhh, what the hell, this is super scary... I-Is there anyone heeeere...?
Shikanosuke let out a frightened voice... but the entrance remained silent.

name: Me
text: (It's too quiet...)

name: Me
text: ーHey. I don't know who's there, but you're watching us, aren't you!?

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan?
I stepped forward and raised my voice towards the other side of the entrance.

name: Me
text: The door to the entrance wasn't locked, so this means that you invited us in, right?
The one who had released those scarecrows was definitely somewhere in here, observing us.

name: Me
text: How about you stop lurking and just come out!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-Hey, Fuma!? Is it okay to say something like thatー?
And then, all of a sudden...
『Ohohohohー You say such insolent things, you little thieves!!!』
A clear voice resonated through the hall. However, we weren't able to see its owner yet.

name: Me
text: Mwahaha, thieves...? Hardly!! We're adventurers!!

name: Hebiko
text: C-Come on, Fuma-chan! Why are you trying to make things complicated!?
『Hmm!? Adventurers you sayー』
We could literally feel the voice's owner sneer at us.
And following that, darkness welled up from the center of the floor, eventually taking shape...
『Preposterous!! You ridiculous little thieves!!!』
『I shall have to teach you a lesson... of the sheer folly it is to intrude upon the Mizuki's castle!!』

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aiiiiiieeeee!? Wh-What is thaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaat!?

name: Hebiko
text: Ehhhhhhhh!!? A g-ghost...!!?
Shikanosuke's, and even Hebiko's, eyes were wide with shock.
...Well, that was only natural.
What appeared in front of us was a ghostーor rather more simply, it was an evil spirit.
It was an extremely bizarre skeleton man, dressed head to toe in a black tuxedo.

name: Me
text: You've finally shown yourself... So you were the one manipulating the scarecrows outside?
『Indeedー』
The voice of the skeleton man resonated clearly.
It was a strange voice that felt like it was coming from the depths of hell, but at the same time, it also had some brightness to it.

name: Me
text: I'm Fuma! Who are you!?

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Ohohohohohー! I am a "butler of the Netherworld," a spirit in defense of this castle!!!!』

name: Me
text: A butler of the Netherworld...? And you're protecting this place...??

name: Me
text: (So he's not the Yukikaze's enemy...? I mean, wasn't the butler of the Mizuki family...)
Hearing the skeleton man's words, I remembered something that had been nagging me. Meanwhile, the skeleton man on the other hand...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『B-Boy!? You, did you just say "Fuma"!?』

name: Me
text: Eh? Yeah, I did but...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『So presenting yourselves as adventurers was a lie, was it!!? How insolent!』

name: Me
text: No, I wouldn't call it a lie, it was more something I said in the heat of the moment I guess...
However, the skeleton man didn't pay my explanation any mind. In fact, he only grew more furious.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『What does Fuma the traitor want!? Surely you must be the minion of Danjo!!』

name: Me
text: Eh!? Danjo...?
Danjo was the former head of the Fumaーmy dirtbag old man.
But he died years ago during an insurrection...

name: Me
text: W-Wait a sec!! It's true that Danjo is my father but...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Y-You are Danjo's son!? Hnngg... So the traitor's son has come to steal Miss Yukikaze away!!』

name: Me
text: Just listen to me, will you!! It's been a long time since Danjo died! I have nothing to do with him!!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『He is dead!? Haha, so that's how it was. You cannot hide your ulterior motives, boy!!』

name: Me
text: Uh? Ulterior motives?
The skeleton man let out a loud sonorous laugh.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『And so you have come to avenge that Danjo by holding Miss Yukikaze for ransom in exchange for the Mizuki's vast fortune!!?』

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Hnnngh... I cannot forgive this!! Such a villainous plotー I absolutely cannot forgive this, boy!!!』

name: Me
text: No, that's not... waaaaiiit!! You're not even listeningー what the!?
*Ruumblleeeeeeeー!!!*
The entire castle was shaking. As if resonating with the butler of the Netherworld's anger, the pieces of decoration started dancing in the air...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Wh-Whoa whoa whoa!!? Wh-Wh-What are we gonna do, Fuma!? That monster is super angry!!

name: Me
text: Nothing we can do!! He's not listening to me at all!!

name: Hebiko
text: Haa... This is exactly why Hebiko had a bad feeling about this...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Ohohohohー! I will turn you youngsters into slabs of meat!!』

name: Me
text: I told you to listen to meeeeeeee!! We're friends with Yukikaze!!

name: Me
text: Maybe you won't listen to me, but what about Hebiko!? She's one of her female friends!!!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Her friendー!? Do you honestly believe I would fall for such nonsense as that!!』

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『In the first place, there is no way an octopus girl monster like her is a fellow student of Miss Yukikaze!!』

name: Hebiko
text: Th-That's rude!!! Hebiko and Yukikaze-chan get along well!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: Silence, sileeeence!! You cephalopoda, coleoidea, eight arms superorder octopus girl!!!

name: Hebiko
text: G-Geez!! You pervert!! You don't need to go through Hebiko's scientific classifications!!!

name: Me
text: That's the part that gets you!? W-Well... let's just fight for now!
We braced ourselves as the flying decorations and furniture began to assault us.
